hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that the #Spirit Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# is on the path of #gold#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Heavy Block Third Chest

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Deku Stick#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Forest Temple Falling Ceiling Room Chest

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that deep #under a vast lake#, one can find #the Bottom of the Well#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that a #village well# leads to #Dodongo's Cavern#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# is on the way of the hero.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that the #Mask of Truth# yields #a Hookshot#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that a #fractured desert wall# hides #Granny's Potion Shop#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# is on the path of #gold#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Child Climb East Chest

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that plundering #the Haunted Wasteland# is a foolish choice.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #chests past Dark Link# in the Water Temple hold...^ #a Red Rupee# and #Zelda's Letter#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that past a #silver block in the Spirit Temple# boulders and a melody conceal...^ #a Spirit Temple Small Key# and #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Early Adult Right Chest

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that plundering #the Temple of Time# is a foolish choice.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that ##Lon Lon Ranch## has #3# major items.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that shooting a #target in the woods# grants #a Deku Stick#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that #a Fire Temple Small Key# can be found in #the Death Mountain Crater#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Blue Fire Arrows#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #a Piece of Heart# can be found on #the Death Mountain Trail#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that at the #Bombchu Bowling Alley#, you will be rewarded with...^ #a Heart Container# and #a Bow#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that ##Gerudo's Fortress## has #2# major items.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Purple Rupee#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Deku Stick#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #Arrows (30 pieces)# can be found at #the Sacred Forest Meadow#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# is on the way of the hero.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Blue Fire Arrows#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Huge Rupee#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that plundering #Zora's Fountain# is a foolish choice.

ToT (Left).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# hoards #a Game Key#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle MQ Deku Scrub Left

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Huge Rupee#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #a Game Key#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #a Game Key#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Zora Scale# and #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Purple Rupee#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that upon the #Colossus's left hand# is #a Boss Key#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# hoards #a Strength Upgrade#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: When all else fails, use Fire.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that Ganondorf will appear in the next Mario Tennis.
